name: Marauders Arena
description:
Marauders Arena v0.4
---------------

Marauders Arena is a vehicular combat arena game. Earn money and fame to upgrade your battle rig and become a legend. This is an on going project, part of a much larger game-to-be that will include free roaming, trading, and RPG elements. This is a one-man project.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Space - Handbreak (use this for better car control)
Reload - R
Suicide - Escape
Use mouse to target
Left Click to shoot
Right Click to attract nearby loot

How to play:
Drive around the arena and destroy all oponents. Wooden crates contain powerups to repair, rearm or refuel your vehicle. Bundles of red barrels explode.

Disclaimer:
This game is not finished, some of the art was not made by me and I do not claim ownership.

Plans for the future:
- Improve sound effects
- Add different arenas
- Add online multiplayer
